In my years of experience, some people stand out for their great personal qualities and others for their business acumen and expertise, Glen is one of those few who stand out in every area.  It is said that when times are great a good leader steps back; and when times are bad, a great leader steps forward.  That statement personifies Glen’s management style.  He is deservedly respected by his team and colleagues and is truly one of the finest people I have ever worked, for or been associated with, in my life.  Glen's knowledge of the staffing industry is unsurpassed and his relationships with his clients, consultants, and team are inspiring.  He motivates by example and establishes trust based on his ethical beliefs and practices.  I am proud to be able to recommend him as an industry leader, a phenomenal director,and a loyal and trusted friend.
